General.Name: Era Co Ltd
General.Description: Era Co., Ltd. research, develops, produces, and sells plastic pipe products in China. The company is also involved in solar energy and electrical switch businesses. It offers switches, sockets, circuit breakers, yuba, ventilation fans, and ceiling appliances. The company also exports its products to approximately 100 countries. The company was formerly known as Yonggao Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Era Co., Ltd. Era Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Taizhou, China.

4.Name: Mr. Weng  Yelong
4.Title: Foreign Trade Sales Director & Non-Independent Director
